name: Game Hatten Tojoukoku
storyline:
When you start the game, there is only the president of the company. Recruit and hire employees. Once the members are gathered, start development. You can start development by selecting the genre, content, and console.

You can have up to four development lines, but the efficiency will be reduced. When vending machines are set up, employees work energetically and efficiency is greatly increased. Try your best to be at the top of the sales list in the midst of various rival companies.
summary: A game store managing sim from Kairosoft
